titles.title: O God and Father, we our praises bring

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God and Father, we our praises bring, For who more worthy of our praise could be Than Thou, who seekest worshipers who sing In spirit and in truth adoringly!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here we unite, our song of joy is one! And Thou, O God, art fully satisfied. Amidst the praises led by Christ, Thy Son, Thou hast a dwelling ever to abide.{/lang-eng}
